channel.title: [Stephen Dawson](www.stephengdawson.com), [Felix Haass](https://felixhaass.de/), Carl Müller-Crepon, and [Aksel Sundström](https://akselsundstrom.com/) on Carl Müller-Crepon
channel.description: Recent content in [Stephen Dawson](www.stephengdawson.com), [Felix Haass](https://felixhaass.de/), Carl Müller-Crepon, and [Aksel Sundström](https://akselsundstrom.com/) on Carl Müller-Crepon

item.title: The Ethnic Politics of Nature Protection: Ethnic Favoritism and Protected Areas in Africa
item.description: We study the effect of ethnic politics on the allocation of protected areas.
